history.content:
Hey guys! Sharing another event that I think will be interesting to many of you.

As a Senior Director of Product Management at Credit Karma, Andreas Gross (Cal class of 2009) is a product leader who's experienced both starting companies that went public (Life360) and scaling established businesses (Reddit, Credit Karma).

One of his biggest projects came while Director of Product Management at Reddit, where Andreas was tasked with leading the redesign of Reddit's desktop experience.

Join us on Friday (August 7th) at 4pm PT as Andreas talks through this journey and the lessons from the experience, as well as his perspectives on building a successful career in product management.

Register here: https://zoom.us/meeting/register/tJMqd-yhqzMtHdan5sNS-ZYNdWT92-GfbdHq

This talk is part of Florian's weekly event series. Florian is a community of Cal alumni helping students pay for school without loans and get ahead in their careers. You can learn more at joinflorian.com.
history.subject: Former Director of Product at Reddit | Speaker Event
